// modmenu: Translatable Descriptions and Summaries in Mod Menu
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.spontaneo:
§lMod introduction:§r
     The wind whimper, thunder roared and bolt scream. A certain energy in the world of Minecraft awakened the potential within the Mobs being.
     The power of the five elements will lead you to the origin of everything. seek, explore, defeat or forgive them.
     Whether you will become an admirer of all Mobs, or an endless slaughterer, everything is your choice...
§lMod Vision:§r
     I hope to make a gameplay mod that is based on the core of the vanilla game and does not destroy the vanilla gameplay. It is very difficult to develop on this basis. Whether an item is added, how to design data so as not to destroy the balance of the game, These are all points that developers need to consider.
    If you think the mod is doing a good job, you are welcome to sponsor my project, or translate this mod, thank your very much!
§e§l version 0.5b.0f update:§r
  1. As the refactored new architectural code is not supported, the 1.19 ~ 1.19.1 release no longer supports subsequent updates as of today
  2. Update the temporary Mod Biome 'Spider Swamp' to 'Creepy Spider Forest'. Adding biome natural blocks, eerie tree and Treacherous Tree and their series blocks, new spider variant 'Spider Larva'
  3. Minecraft's vanilla biome will no longer produce spider variants, which will only be created in the creepy spider forest
  4. Change the spawn spider of spider egg cocoon from three large spider to three spider larvas
  5. Change version 1.19.4 and above to the default world type to 'Spontaneous-Replace'. Now you don't need to manually switch the world preset. 'SR Temporary' will be replaced with 'SR Snapshot'
  6. Continue to improve the mod code structure and configuration file structure
  7. Added zooming actions to the 1.18.2 animation system to improve the problem that zooming was not supported in the vanilla ModelPart
  8. Fixed an open folder crash in Mod due to system incompatibility
  9. Fixed an issue where pressing ESC on the mod screen returned the title interface directly
  10. Fixed a problem with Ju-ger repeating crossbow drop models that were too large
  11. Now AuCu, CuFe, steel block can activate the beacon
  12. Add the block tag spontaneous_replace:cobwebs, where the blocks are broken 15 times faster with swords and scissors
  13. Add the block tag spontaneous_replace:eerie_rinds, in which the block is identified as an eerie wooden shell
  14. Add the biome tag spontaneous_replace:is_spider_biome, and the biome in this tag was identified as spider biome
text.spontaneous_replace.mod_introductio:
§r   The wind whimper, thunder roared and bolt scream. A certain energy in the world of Minecraft awakened the potential within the Mobs being.
   The power of the five elements will lead you to the origin of everything. seek, explore, defeat or forgive them.
   Whether you will become an admirer of all Mobs, or an endless slaughterer, everything is your choice...
text.spontaneous_replace.mod_vision:
I hope to make a gameplay mod that is based on the core of the vanilla game and does not destroy the vanilla gameplay. It is very difficult to develop on this basis. Whether an item is added, how to design data so as not to destroy the balance of the game, These are all points that developers need to consider.
   If you think the mod is doing a good job, you are welcome to sponsor my project, or translate this mod, thank your very much!
text.spontaneous_replace.target: Remake the entire spider variant biome, add a new spider and other decorative blocks, etc.
text.spontaneous_replace.mod_update_noti: SR %s has updated, please update quickly!
text.spontaneous_replace.updating_fail: Update failed. Check your network connection and try again
text.spontaneous_replace.auto_download: Spontaneous-Replace %s has been installed in the mods folder. Please delete the old version quickly
text.spontaneous_replace.auto_update: Spontaneous-Replace %s has been installed in the mods folder. Please close the game to clean the files
text.spontaneous_replace.stop_update_war: SR has stopped updating in the current MC ver
text.spontaneous_replace.update_fail_war: SR update system fail, please update the mod in time
text.spontaneous_replace.log: Has been updated to the latest version, please check the update log
setting_text.spontaneous_replace.placeho: This function has NOT been added YET, Please continue to pay ATTENTION to the homepage of this Mod to get UPDATES in time.
setting_tooltip.spontaneous_replace.auto: Automatically close the option interface button if the Mod Menu is installed
Always show the configuration button in the options interface
setting_tooltip.spontaneous_replace.mod_: Remove as much mod content as possible from the game, but most registered components cannot be easily removed. If you just don't want this mod all you need is to move this mod out of the mods folder
setting_text.spontaneous_replace.tempora: Enable Temporary SR Adventure (Need Game Restart)
setting_tooltip.spontaneous_replace.temp:
§l§oThe game needs to be restarted, and the generated chunks of the old map will still retain the mod content§r
It will open the original creation SR survival and adventure gameplay for players to play temporarily

§l§oThe game needs to be restarted, and the generated chunks of the old map will still retain the mod content§r
The temporary adventure gameplay will be canceled, but the original expansion content will not be affected
setting_tooltip.spontaneous_replace.disa: Enabling will disable all world warning advice
Turn off to display a warning advice normally
setting_tooltip.spontaneous_replace.upda: If there is a mod update, an update notify screen that occupies the whole game will pop up directly.
A screen that occupies the entire game will not pop up, but updates will still be prompted in the game.
setting_tooltip.spontaneous_replace.show: If you start the new version mod for the first time, an update log screen that occupies the entire game will pop up to make it easy to view the new features.
The update log screen will no longer pop up, but can still be viewed from the menu
setting_tooltip.spontaneous_replace.chec: If the mod supports a new version of Minecraft, it will also notify for updates
Do not notify the mod update of the new version of Minecraft
setting_tooltip.spontaneous_replace.stop: If the mod stops updating on this version of Minecraft, the player is warned every time the game starts
Even if the mod stops updating on this version of Minecraft, it doesn't notify the player
setting_tooltip.spontaneous_replace.upda: A warning is displayed if the mod's update system can not get the update information while it is online
Players are not warned even if the mod update system fails
Updates will be redirected to the mod download page, you need to download the update mod yourself

§c§l§o!Attention! Will not auto download the Dependencies!§r
Updates will auto download the latest mod version file to the mods folder, requiring manual deletion of the old mod file

§6§l§oCan only be used on Windows OS!§r
§c§l§o!Attention! Will not auto download the Dependencies!§r
The mod will auto do all the work required for the update. You just need to open the game after the mod update is complete!

The official/released version of the mod.
Get the update in the Release channel of the download web

The Pre/test/beta/B test version of the mod, pre-experience not yet perfect updated content.
Usually the snapshot version is published in the Discord, not the mod web site.
Get the update in the Beta channel of the download web

The Alpha/A test version of the mod, The version in development is very unstable.
Typically, development versions are available only to sponsors and partners.
Get the update in the Alpha channel of the download web

Add metal that can be added or synthetic material

Try to crafting a new metal
Upgrade your iron pickaxe to CuFe alloy
Create CuFe alloy equipment to replace your old armor
Have a full set of steel armor
Try to crafting a new ranged equipment
Use slingshot to launch a ender pearl
Use slingshot to launch a potion
Using a unique Chinese repeating crossbow
Kill at least 100 monsters with a Ju-ger repeating crossbow
Shoot at least 1000 arrows with a Ju-ger repeating crossbow
Have a Ju-ger repeating crossbow with 'Multishot' and 'Quick Charge III' enchantment
Using a powerful Chinese ultra-long-range crossbow
Hit the bullseye of a Target block from at least 300 meters away
Kill a Skeleton from at least 100 meters away
Have a marks-crossbow with 'Piercing IV' and 'Quick Charge III' enchantment
advancements.spontaneous_replace.hello_p: Play "Spontaneous-Replace" in Survival or Adventure Mode
advancements.spontaneous_replace.spider_: Contact to spontaneous evolving spider biome
Shoot a spray poison spider with an arrow
